title: Initial Entry
description: Enter the four-digit code on the screen.  The order of entry does not matter.

title: Troubleshooting: Screen Lock
description: If the screen locks up (numbers remain displayed and the device doesn't unlock), repeatedly tap the screen until it goes blank with a red blinking light.

title: Reset and Re-entry
description: Once the screen is blank with a red blink, re-enter the four-digit code to unlock the device.
